languages.text: Могучий хелбрут, показавший свою нечестивую мощь при планетарном штурме, укрывается в Машинном храме Ефрата-II. Молодой Хальбрандт из стаи Грозовых укусов желает покарать его, но Ульфар намерен опередить дерзкого собрата и сам снискать славу победителя могучего еретика.

Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.
languages.original_text: Могучий хелбрут, показавший свою нечестивую мощь при планетарном штурме, укрывается в Машинном храме Ефрата-II. Молодой Хальбрандт из стаи Грозовых укусов желает покарать его, но Ульфар намерен опередить дерзкого собрата и сам снискать славу победителя могучего еретика.

traits.locale_text: Balescream, the mighty Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Balescream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Balescream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

languages.text: Le Fléau Hurlant, le Métabrutus qui a déchaîné sa puissance impie pendant l'assaut planétaire, rôde maintenant dans la Cathédrale de la Machine d'Euphrate-II. Le jeune Halbrandt des Crocs de la tempête veut donner au Fléau Hurlant le châtiment qu'il mérite, mais Ulfar compte bien devancer son frère audacieux et tuer à lui seul le monstrueux hérétique.
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

traits.locale_text: Le Fléau Hurlant, le Métabrutus qui a déchaîné sa puissance impie pendant l'assaut planétaire, rôde maintenant dans la Cathédrale de la Machine d'Euphrate-II. Le jeune Halbrandt des Crocs de la tempête veut donner au Fléau Hurlant le châtiment qu'il mérite, mais Ulfar compte bien devancer son frère audacieux et tuer à lui seul le monstrueux hérétique.

languages.text: 行星进攻期间，一头名为“灾啸”的地狱兽展现了可怕的邪恶力量，对行商浪人的攻势造成了巨大阻碍。如今，这头地狱兽正徘徊在欧夫拉茨二号星的机械大教堂。噬风者狼群的年轻野狼哈尔布兰特打算进行报复，但乌尔法却打算战胜他的兄弟，亲手杀死这头猎物，为自己的狼群赢得荣耀。
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

traits.locale_text: 行星进攻期间，一头名为“灾啸”的地狱兽展现了可怕的邪恶力量，对行商浪人的攻势造成了巨大阻碍。如今，这头地狱兽正徘徊在欧夫拉茨二号星的机械大教堂。噬风者狼群的年轻野狼哈尔布兰特打算进行报复，但乌尔法却打算战胜他的兄弟，亲手杀死这头猎物，为自己的狼群赢得荣耀。

languages.text: ドゥームスクリームとは、惑星襲撃中に不浄な力が明らかになったヘルブルートであり、現在はユーフラテス・IIの機械大聖堂を徘徊している。嵐喰いの群れの若きハルブラントはドゥームスクリームに報復しようとするが、ウルファーは恐れ知らずな兄弟を倒して獲物を奪い、残忍な異端者討伐の栄光を独り占めしようと考えていた。
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

traits.locale_text: ドゥームスクリームとは、惑星襲撃中に不浄な力が明らかになったヘルブルートであり、現在はユーフラテス・IIの機械大聖堂を徘徊している。嵐喰いの群れの若きハルブラントはドゥームスクリームに報復しようとするが、ウルファーは恐れ知らずな兄弟を倒して獲物を奪い、残忍な異端者討伐の栄光を独り占めしようと考えていた。

languages.text: Unheilsschrei, der Höllenschlächter, dessen unheilige Macht während des Angriffs auf den Planeten zu bestaunen war, streift nun durch die Maschinenkathedrale von Eufrates II. Der junge Halbrandt vom Rudel der Stormbiters will sich an Unheilsschrei rächen, doch Ulfar will seinem verwegenen Bruder zuvorkommen. Der Ruhm für den Sieg über den monströsen Ketzer soll ihm gehören.
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

traits.locale_text: Unheilsschrei, der Höllenschlächter, dessen unheilige Macht während des Angriffs auf den Planeten zu bestaunen war, streift nun durch die Maschinenkathedrale von Eufrates II. Der junge Halbrandt vom Rudel der Stormbiters will sich an Unheilsschrei rächen, doch Ulfar will seinem verwegenen Bruder zuvorkommen. Der Ruhm für den Sieg über den monströsen Ketzer soll ihm gehören.

languages.text: Doomscream, el Bruto Infernal cuyo blasfemo poder quedó demostrado durante el asalto al planeta, ahora recorre la Catedral Máquina de Eufrates II. El joven Halbrandt, de los Muerdetormentas, quiere vengarse de Doomscream, pero Ulfar tiene intención de adelantarse a su valiente hermano y cobrarse él la gloria de destruir al monstruoso hereje.
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.

traits.locale_text: Doomscream, el Bruto Infernal cuyo blasfemo poder quedó demostrado durante el asalto al planeta, ahora recorre la Catedral Máquina de Eufrates II. El joven Halbrandt, de los Muerdetormentas, quiere vengarse de Doomscream, pero Ulfar tiene intención de adelantarse a su valiente hermano y cobrarse él la gloria de destruir al monstruoso hereje.

languages.text: Gezegen saldırısı sırasında uğursuz kudreti ortaya çıkan Tamu Kaçkını Belanarası, şimdi Eufrates II'deki Makine Katedrali'nde boy gösteriyor. Borayutanlar sürüsünden genç Halbrandt, Belanarası'ndan intikam almak istiyor. Fakat Ulfar, cüretkâr kardeşini av olarak kullanıp devasa kâfiri yenme şerefini kendisi edinmek istiyor.
languages.original_text: Doomscream, the Helbrute whose unholy might was made apparent during the planetary assault, now prowls the Machine Cathedral of Eufrates II. Young Halbrandt from the Stormbiters pack wants to exact retribution on Doomscream, but Ulfar intends to beat his audacious brother to the prey and claim the glory of defeating the monstrous heretic for himself.
